values: welcome to my journal! this is just a side journal i'm going to keep that will kinda be a pun place for my friend made/self induced fandom, A Mighty Ranger. i know you're at a loss...so click here to learn about it!

*lumos* Well, I have arrived at my home for the next two terms. Mum and Dad dropped me off at Kings Crossing and I made my way to Platform 9 3/4 where I had no trouble finding the entrance, unlike a skinny boy with glasses and untidy hair. He was foolish enough to ask a conductor where the platform was! I found my seat in one of the compartments on the Hogwarts Express and had just settled down when I was joined by a boy with a toad. He told me his name was Neivelle and he seemed extremly nervous for someone who was already use to living in this magical world. After a nice witch came by with a trolly of snacks, Neivelle noticed he had lost his toad. Knowing he would need help, I at once set out to look in other compartments. When I reached the last one, who should I find but the skinny boy with glasses and another boy with red hair and a rather long nose. The boy with red hair was about to do a spell and I wanted to stay and see how he did. Seemed that his spell to turn his rat yellow wasn't very good and I told him so. To demonstrate how a spell really works, I took out my wand and pointed at the skinny boy's glasses and used the simple spell "oculous repairo" to fix his tapped up glasses. It was when he looked up at me I noticed a lightening bolt shaped scar on his forehead. This was Harry Potter! I immediatly knew that I needed to introduce myself as he could be useful in my later plans. After telling him who he was (because he obviously didn't seem to care) I told him I was Hermione Granger, a mighty ranger. This didn't seem to impress him as he just exchanged looks with the red headed boy who had yet to introduce himself, so I asked who he was. Ron Weasley. I have been sorted into Gryffindor house along with Harry Potter and Ron Weasley, both of whom have yet to thank me for my help on the train. It has been a long day and I have class tomorrow. Good-night. *knox*
Which HP Kid Are You?
